message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, it's worth $80 to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $75 for this product. This offer is exclusive to you and is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
